metadata.title: CVE-2020-22031 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A Heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability exists in FFmpeg 4.2 at libavfilter/vf_w3fdif.c in filter16_complex_low, which might lead to memory corruption and other potential consequences.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3').
